tree_properties.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ===========================================
00002 !
00003 !           TREE_PROPERTIES
00004 !
00005 !   Fill in tree properties: charges, multipole moments etc
00006 !   from bottom up
00007 !
00008 ! ===========================================
00009 
00010 subroutine tree_properties
00011 
00012   use treevars
00013   use tree_utils
00014 
00015   implicit none
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   integer*8, dimension(maxaddress) ::  search_key, resolve_key, parent_key, sum_key, key_twig
00019   integer*8, dimension(8) :: sub_key, key_child
00020 
00021   integer, dimension(maxaddress) ::  node_twig, child_twig    ! all twig-nodes, including branches and base nodes
00022   integer, dimension(maxaddress) ::  parent_node, parent_addr
00023   integer, dimension(maxaddress) :: local_node
00024   integer :: addr_twig
00025 
00026   integer, parameter :: n_moments = 23  ! # property arrays
00027   real*8, dimension(max(4*n_moments*nbranch_max/num_pe,10000)) :: local_moments      ! local branch properties    - size depends on # moments          
00028   real*8, dimension(n_moments*nbranch_max) :: branch_moments   ! global branch properties
00029   integer, dimension(num_pe) :: nbranchmoments ! array containing total # multipole terms*branch list length
00030   integer, dimension(num_pe) :: recv_strides, recv_counts
00031   integer, dimension(nbranch_max) :: bindex, branch_addr, branch_node, branch_level
00032   logical :: duplicate(maxaddress)
00033 
00034   integer :: addr_child
00035   integer, dimension(8) :: node_child  !  child nodes
00036   real*8, dimension(8) :: xs, ys, zs   ! multipole shift vector
00037 
00038   real*8 :: xss, yss, zss, gamma, vx, vy, vz
00039   integer :: i, j, k, maxlevel, nchild, ncheck, ntwig_domain, nsearch, newsub, cchild 
00040   integer :: node_b, nuniq, nsub, nparent, ilevel, ibr, pno, bno
00041   integer ::  addr_leaf, p_leaf, node_leaf       ! local leaf-nodes
00042   integer :: ierr, nbuf
00043   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00044 
00045 
00046   if (tree_debug) write(ipefile,'(a)') 'TREE PROPERTIES'
00047   if (me==0 .and. tree_debug) write(*,'(a)') 'LPEPC | PROPERTIES'
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051   ! Zero multipole arrays
00052   do i=-ntwig_pw, nleaf_pw
00053      charge(i) = 0.
00054      abs_charge(i) = 0.
00055      xcoc(i) = 0.
00056      ycoc(i) = 0.
00057      zcoc(i) = 0.
00058      xdip(i) = 0.
00059      ydip(i) = 0.
00060      zdip(i) = 0.
00061      xxquad(i) = 0.
00062      yyquad(i) = 0.
00063      zzquad(i) = 0.
00064      xyquad(i) = 0.
00065      yzquad(i) = 0.
00066      zxquad(i) = 0.
00067      magmx(i) = 0.
00068      magmy(i) = 0.
00069      magmz(i) = 0.
00070      jx(i) = 0.
00071      jy(i) = 0.
00072      jz(i) = 0.
00073   end do
00074 
00075   !  Start with *local* leaf properties
00076 
00077   ! key_leaf(1:nleaf_me) =  pack(htable%key, mask = (htable%node > 0 .and. htable%owner == me) )  ! local leaf keys (could be predefined
00078   do i=1, nleaf_me
00079      addr_leaf = key2addr( leaf_key(i),'PROPERTIES: local' )   !  Table address
00080      p_leaf = htable( addr_leaf )%node   !  Local particle index  - points to properties on PE
00081      node_leaf = p_leaf   !  Leaf node index is identical to particle index for *local* leaves 
00082 
00083      xcoc( node_leaf ) = x( p_leaf )         ! Centre of charge
00084      ycoc( node_leaf ) = y( p_leaf )
00085      zcoc( node_leaf ) = z( p_leaf )
00086 
00087      charge( node_leaf ) = q( p_leaf )       ! Charge
00088      abs_charge( node_leaf ) = abs( q(p_leaf) )   ! Absolute charge (needed for c.o.c)
00089 
00090      xdip( node_leaf ) = x(p_leaf) * q(p_leaf)   ! Dipole moment
00091      ydip( node_leaf ) = y(p_leaf) * q(p_leaf) 
00092      zdip( node_leaf ) = z(p_leaf) * q(p_leaf) 
00093 
00094      xxquad( node_leaf ) = q(p_leaf) * x(p_leaf)**2   ! Quadrupole moment
00095      yyquad( node_leaf ) = q(p_leaf) * y(p_leaf)**2   
00096      zzquad( node_leaf ) = q(p_leaf) * z(p_leaf)**2   
00097      xyquad( node_leaf ) = q(p_leaf) * x(p_leaf) * y(p_leaf) 
00098      yzquad( node_leaf ) = q(p_leaf) * y(p_leaf) * z(p_leaf)  
00099      zxquad( node_leaf ) = q(p_leaf) * z(p_leaf) * x(p_leaf)   
00100 
00101      !  get true velocities from momenta
00102      gamma = sqrt(1.0+ux(p_leaf)**2+uy(p_leaf)**2 + uz(p_leaf)**2)
00103      vx = ux(p_leaf)/gamma
00104      vy = uy(p_leaf)/gamma
00105      vz = uz(p_leaf)/gamma
00106      jx( node_leaf ) = vx * q(p_leaf)   ! Drift moment
00107      jy( node_leaf ) = vy * q(p_leaf) 
00108      jz( node_leaf ) = vz * q(p_leaf) 
00109 
00110      magmx( node_leaf ) = 0.5*q(p_leaf) * ( y(p_leaf)*vz - z(p_leaf)*vy)  ! Magnetic dipole moment
00111      magmy( node_leaf ) = 0.5*q(p_leaf) * ( z(p_leaf)*vx - x(p_leaf)*vz)  
00112      magmz( node_leaf ) = 0.5*q(p_leaf) * ( x(p_leaf)*vy - y(p_leaf)*vx)  
00113 
00114 
00115      !  Zero shift vector
00116      xshift( node_leaf ) = 0.
00117      yshift( node_leaf ) = 0.
00118      zshift( node_leaf ) = 0.
00119   end do
00120 
00121 
00122   !  Accumulate local twig properties
00123 
00124   ! Make list of twig nodes contained within local branch list (pebranch).  Recursive search adapted from make_branches.
00125 
00126 
00127   search_key(1:nbranch) = pebranch(1:nbranch)            ! start with branch list
00128   ncheck = 0       ! Checksum
00129   newsub = 0
00130   ntwig_domain = 0  ! # twigs contained in branch list
00131   nsearch = nbranch
00132 
00133   do while ( ncheck < nleaf_me )     ! Repeat until all local leaves found
00134 
00135      do i=1,nsearch
00136         if (  htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'PROPERTIES: twigs' ) )%node > 0 ) then
00137            !  leaf,  so skip and increment checksum
00138            ncheck = ncheck +  1  
00139 
00140         else 
00141            ! twig: add to list and  subdivide
00142            ntwig_domain = ntwig_domain + 1
00143            key_twig(ntwig_domain) = search_key(i)
00144 
00145            cchild = htable( key2addr( search_key(i),'PROPERTIES: tw2' ) )%childcode   !  Children byte-code
00146            nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(cchild,j,1),j=0,7) /) ) ! # children = sum of bits in byte-code
00147            sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(cchild,j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract child sub-keys from byte code
00148 
00149            resolve_key(newsub+1:newsub+nchild) = IOR( ishft( search_key(i),3 ), sub_key(1:nchild) ) ! Add keys of children to new search list
00150            newsub = newsub + nchild
00151 
00152         endif
00153      end do
00154 
00155      search_key(1:newsub) = resolve_key(1:newsub)        ! Put children into search list
00156      nsearch = newsub  ! # new nodes to search
00157      newsub = 0
00158   end do
00159 
00160   call sort(key_twig(1:ntwig_domain))
00161 
00162   if (tree_debug) then
00163 !     write (ipefile,*) 'Twigs contained in local branch list: ',key_twig(1:ntwig_domain)
00164      write (ipefile,*) '# Twigs contained in local branch list: ',ntwig_domain
00165      write (ipefile,*) 'Found ',ncheck,' out of ',nleaf,' leaves'
00166   endif
00167 
00168   do i=1,ntwig_domain
00169      addr_twig = key2addr( key_twig(i),'PROPERTIES: domain' )   !  Table address
00170      node_twig(i) = htable( addr_twig )%node   !  Twig node index  
00171      child_twig(i) = htable( addr_twig )%childcode   !  Twig children byte-code 
00172   end do
00173 
00174   ! Go up through tree, starting at deepest level (largest key first)
00175   ! and accumulate multipole moments onto twig nodes
00176 
00177   do i = ntwig_domain,1,-1
00178      nchild = SUM( (/ (ibits(child_twig(i),j,1),j=0,7) /) )                 ! Get # children
00179      sub_key(1:nchild) = pack( bitarr, mask=(/ (btest(child_twig(i),j),j=0,7) /) )  ! Extract sub key from byte code
00180 
00181      do j=1,nchild
00182         key_child(j) = IOR( ishft( key_twig(i),3 ), sub_key(j) )      ! Construct keys of children
00183         addr_child = key2addr( key_child(j),'PROPERTIES: domain2' )             ! Table address of children
00184         node_child(j) = htable( addr_child )%node                     ! Child node index  
00185      end do
00186 
00187      charge( node_twig(i) ) = SUM( charge( node_child(1:nchild) ) )                 ! Sum charge of child nodes and place
00188      ! result with parent node
00189      abs_charge( node_twig(i) ) = SUM( abs_charge( node_child(1:nchild) ) )                 ! Sum |q|
00190 
00191      ! Centres of charge
00192      xcoc( node_twig(i) ) = 0.
00193      ycoc( node_twig(i) ) = 0.
00194      zcoc( node_twig(i) ) = 0.
00195 
00196      do j=1,nchild
00197         xcoc( node_twig(i) ) = xcoc( node_twig(i) ) + ( xcoc(node_child(j)) * abs_charge(node_child(j))) &
00198              / abs_charge( node_twig(i) )
00199         ycoc( node_twig(i) ) = ycoc( node_twig(i) ) + ( ycoc(node_child(j)) * abs_charge(node_child(j))) &
00200              / abs_charge( node_twig(i) )
00201         zcoc( node_twig(i) ) = zcoc( node_twig(i) ) + ( zcoc(node_child(j)) * abs_charge(node_child(j))) &
00202              / abs_charge( node_twig(i) )
00203      end do
00204 
00205      ! Shifts and multipole moments
00206      xs(1:nchild) = xcoc( node_twig(i) ) - xshift( node_child(1:nchild) )     ! Shift vector for current node
00207      ys(1:nchild) = ycoc( node_twig(i) ) - yshift( node_child(1:nchild) )
00208      zs(1:nchild) = zcoc( node_twig(i) ) - zshift( node_child(1:nchild) )
00209 
00210      xshift( node_twig(i) ) = xcoc( node_twig(i) ) ! Shift variable for next level up
00211      yshift( node_twig(i) ) = ycoc( node_twig(i) ) 
00212      zshift( node_twig(i) ) = zcoc( node_twig(i) ) 
00213 
00214 
00215 
00216      do j = 1,nchild
00217         ! dipole moment
00218 
00219         xdip( node_twig(i) ) = xdip( node_twig(i) ) + xdip( node_child(j) ) - charge( node_child(j) )*xs(j) 
00220         ydip( node_twig(i) ) = ydip( node_twig(i) ) + ydip( node_child(j) ) - charge( node_child(j) )*ys(j) 
00221         zdip( node_twig(i) ) = zdip( node_twig(i) ) + zdip( node_child(j) ) - charge( node_child(j) )*zs(j) 
00222 
00223         ! quadrupole moment
00224         xxquad( node_twig(i) ) = xxquad( node_twig(i) ) + xxquad( node_child(j) ) - 2*xdip( node_child(j) )*xs(j) &
00225              + charge( node_child(j) )*xs(j)**2 
00226         yyquad( node_twig(i) ) = yyquad( node_twig(i) ) + yyquad( node_child(j) ) - 2*ydip( node_child(j) )*ys(j) &
00227              + charge( node_child(j) )*ys(j)**2 
00228         zzquad( node_twig(i) ) = zzquad( node_twig(i) ) + zzquad( node_child(j) ) - 2*zdip( node_child(j) )*zs(j) &
00229              + charge( node_child(j) )*zs(j)**2 
00230 
00231         xyquad( node_twig(i) ) = xyquad( node_twig(i) ) + xyquad( node_child(j) ) - xdip( node_child(j) )*ys(j) &
00232              - ydip( node_child(j) )*xs(j) + charge( node_child(j) )*xs(j)*ys(j) 
00233         yzquad( node_twig(i) ) = yzquad( node_twig(i) ) + yzquad( node_child(j) ) - ydip( node_child(j) )*zs(j) &
00234              - zdip( node_child(j) )*ys(j) + charge( node_child(j) )*ys(j)*zs(j) 
00235         zxquad( node_twig(i) ) = zxquad( node_twig(i) ) + zxquad( node_child(j) ) - zdip( node_child(j) )*xs(j) &
00236              - xdip( node_child(j) )*zs(j) + charge( node_child(j) )*zs(j)*xs(j) 
00237 
00238         ! magnetic dipole moment
00239         magmx( node_twig(i) ) = magmx( node_twig(i) ) + magmx( node_child(j) ) - 0.5*ys(j)*jz( node_child(j) )  - 0.5*zs(j)*jy( node_child(j) )
00240         magmy( node_twig(i) ) = magmy( node_twig(i) ) + magmy( node_child(j) ) - 0.5*zs(j)*jx( node_child(j) )  - 0.5*xs(j)*jz( node_child(j) )
00241         magmz( node_twig(i) ) = magmz( node_twig(i) ) + magmz( node_child(j) ) - 0.5*xs(j)*jy( node_child(j) )  - 0.5*ys(j)*jx( node_child(j) )
00242 
00243         jx( node_twig(i) ) = jx( node_twig(i) ) + jx( node_child(j) )       ! Sum currents of child nodes
00244         jy( node_twig(i) ) = jy( node_twig(i) ) + jy( node_child(j) )  
00245         jz( node_twig(i) ) = jz( node_twig(i) ) + jz( node_child(j) )  
00246      end do
00247   end do
00248 
00249 
00250   ! Should now have multipole information up to branch list level(s).
00251   ! By definition, this is complete: each branch node is self-contained.
00252   ! This information has to be broadcast to the other PEs so that the top levels can be filled in.
00253 
00254   local_node(1:nbranch) =  (/ ( htable( key2addr( pebranch(i),'PROPERTIES: branch' ) )%node, i=1,nbranch ) /)    ! Node #s of local branches
00255 
00256   ! Prepare properties for broadcast
00257 
00258   do i=1,nbranch
00259      ibr = (i-1)*n_moments
00260      local_moments(ibr+1) = charge( local_node(i) )
00261      local_moments(ibr+2) = abs_charge( local_node(i) )
00262      local_moments(ibr+3) = xcoc( local_node(i) )
00263      local_moments(ibr+4) = ycoc( local_node(i) )
00264      local_moments(ibr+5) = zcoc( local_node(i) )
00265      local_moments(ibr+6) = xshift( local_node(i) )
00266      local_moments(ibr+7) = yshift( local_node(i) )
00267      local_moments(ibr+8) = zshift( local_node(i) )
00268      local_moments(ibr+9) =  xdip( local_node(i) )
00269      local_moments(ibr+10) = ydip( local_node(i) )
00270      local_moments(ibr+11) = zdip( local_node(i) )
00271      local_moments(ibr+12) = xxquad( local_node(i) )
00272      local_moments(ibr+13) = yyquad( local_node(i) )
00273      local_moments(ibr+14) = zzquad( local_node(i) )
00274      local_moments(ibr+15) = xyquad( local_node(i) )
00275      local_moments(ibr+16) = yzquad( local_node(i) )
00276      local_moments(ibr+17) = zxquad( local_node(i) )
00277      local_moments(ibr+18) = magmx( local_node(i) )
00278      local_moments(ibr+19) = magmy( local_node(i) )
00279      local_moments(ibr+20) = magmz( local_node(i) )
00280      local_moments(ibr+21) = jx( local_node(i) )
00281      local_moments(ibr+22) = jy( local_node(i) )
00282      local_moments(ibr+23) = jz( local_node(i) )
00283   end do
00284 
00285   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Synchronize
00286 
00287   !  Collect multipole properties
00288 
00289   recv_counts(1:num_pe) = n_moments*nbranches(1:num_pe)   ! # terms in global array
00290   recv_strides(1:num_pe) = n_moments*igap(1:num_pe)       ! Stride lengths for global array
00291   nbuf = n_moments*nbranch
00292 
00293 
00294   call MPI_ALLGATHERV( local_moments, nbuf, MPI_REAL8, &
00295        branch_moments, recv_counts, recv_strides, MPI_REAL8, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00296 
00297 
00298   !  write (ipefile,'(/a/a/(2i5,i10,f10.3))') 'Global branch properties:','   #     owner     key     abs(q) ', &
00299   !       (i,branch_owner(i), branch_key(i), branch_acharge(i),i=1,nbranch_sum)
00300 
00301   ! Copy info from *non-local* branches into property arrays of local tree
00302 
00303   do i=1,nbranch_sum
00304      ibr = (i-1)*n_moments
00305      if (branch_owner(i) /= me) then
00306         node_b = htable( key2addr( branch_key(i),'PROPERTIES: branch copy' ))%node   !  branch node index: already defined in MAKE_BRANCHES
00307         charge( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+1)      ! Copy collected remote branch props into main arrays
00308         abs_charge( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+2)  
00309         xcoc( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+3)  
00310         ycoc( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+4)  
00311         zcoc( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+5)  
00312         xshift( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+6)  
00313         yshift( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+7)  
00314         zshift( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+8)  
00315         xdip( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+9)  
00316         ydip( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+10)  
00317         zdip( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+11)  
00318         xxquad( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+12)  
00319         yyquad( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+13)  
00320         zzquad( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+14)  
00321         xyquad( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+15)  
00322         yzquad( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+16)  
00323         zxquad( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+17)  
00324         magmx( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+18)  
00325         magmy( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+19)  
00326         magmz( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+20)  
00327         jx( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+21)  
00328         jy( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+22)  
00329         jz( node_b ) = branch_moments(ibr+23)  
00330      endif
00331   end do
00332 
00333   ! Fill up top levels with tree properties: same algorithm as TREE_FILL
00334 
00335   maxlevel = 0
00336   do i=1,nbranch_sum
00337      branch_level(i) = log(1.*branch_key(i))/log(8.)       ! Get levels of branch nodes
00338      maxlevel = max( maxlevel,branch_level(i) )                                    ! Find maximum level
00339   end do
00340 
00341   nparent = 0
00342 
00343   do ilevel = maxlevel,1,-1                                           ! Start at deepest branch level and work up to root
00344      nsub = count( mask=branch_level(1:nbranch_sum) == ilevel )                      ! Count # branches at this level
00345      sum_key(1:nsub) =  pack(branch_key(1:nbranch_sum), mask = branch_level(1:nbranch_sum) == ilevel)       ! Pick out branches at current level
00346 
00347      sum_key(nsub+1:nsub+nparent) = parent_key(1:nparent)             ! Augment list with parent keys checked at previous level
00348      nsub = nsub + nparent
00349      call sort(sum_key(1:nsub))   ! Sort keys
00350 
00351      sum_key(nsub+1) = 0
00352      duplicate(1:nsub) = (/ (sum_key(i) /= sum_key(i+1), i=1,nsub) /)  ! Identify unique keys     
00353      nuniq= count(mask = duplicate(1:nsub))                            ! Count them
00354      sum_key(1:nuniq) = pack(sum_key(1:nsub), mask = duplicate(1:nsub))        ! Compress list
00355 
00356      do i=1,nuniq
00357         branch_addr(i) = key2addr( sum_key(i),'PROPERTIES: fill' )   !  branches' #table addresses
00358         branch_node(i) =  htable( branch_addr(i ) )%node
00359 
00360         parent_key(i) = ISHFT( sum_key(i),-3 )                ! parent keys
00361         parent_addr(i) = key2addr( parent_key(i),'PROPERTIES:fill' )   ! parents' #table addresses
00362         parent_node(i) =  htable( parent_addr(i) )%node          ! parents' node numbers
00363      end do
00364 
00365      ! Compute parent properties from children
00366      do i=nuniq,1,-1
00367         abs_charge( parent_node(i) ) = abs_charge( parent_node(i) ) + abs_charge( branch_node(i) )           ! Sum |q|
00368         charge( parent_node(i) ) = charge( parent_node(i) ) + charge( branch_node(i) )                       ! Sum q
00369      end do
00370 
00371      ! parent charges should be complete before computing coq's
00372 
00373      do i=nuniq,1,-1
00374         ! Centres of charge
00375         xcoc( parent_node(i) ) = xcoc(parent_node(i)) + (xcoc( branch_node(i) ) * abs_charge( branch_node(i) ) ) &
00376              / abs_charge( parent_node(i)) ! coq
00377         ycoc( parent_node(i) ) = ycoc(parent_node(i)) + (ycoc( branch_node(i) ) * abs_charge( branch_node(i) ) ) &
00378              / abs_charge( parent_node(i)) ! coq
00379         zcoc( parent_node(i) ) = zcoc(parent_node(i)) + (zcoc( branch_node(i) ) * abs_charge( branch_node(i) ) ) &
00380              / abs_charge( parent_node(i)) ! coq
00381 
00382      end do
00383 
00384      do i=nuniq,1,-1
00385         ! Shifts and multipole moments
00386         xss = xcoc( parent_node(i) ) - xshift( branch_node(i)  )     ! Shift vector for current child node
00387         yss = ycoc( parent_node(i) ) - yshift( branch_node(i) )
00388         zss = zcoc( parent_node(i) ) - zshift( branch_node(i) )
00389 
00390         xshift( parent_node(i) ) = xcoc( parent_node(i) ) ! Shift variable for next level up
00391         yshift( parent_node(i) ) = ycoc( parent_node(i) ) 
00392         zshift( parent_node(i) ) = zcoc( parent_node(i) ) 
00393 
00394         ! dipole moment
00395         xdip( parent_node(i) ) = xdip( parent_node(i) ) + xdip( branch_node(i) ) - charge( branch_node(i) )*xss 
00396         ydip( parent_node(i) ) = ydip( parent_node(i) ) + ydip( branch_node(i) ) - charge( branch_node(i) )*yss 
00397         zdip( parent_node(i) ) = zdip( parent_node(i) ) + zdip( branch_node(i) ) - charge( branch_node(i) )*zss 
00398 
00399         ! quadrupole moment
00400         xxquad( parent_node(i) ) = xxquad( parent_node(i) ) +  xxquad( branch_node(i) ) - 2*xdip( branch_node(i) )*xss &
00401              + charge( branch_node(i) )*xss**2 
00402         yyquad( parent_node(i) ) = yyquad( parent_node(i) ) +  yyquad( branch_node(i) ) - 2*ydip( branch_node(i) )*yss &
00403              + charge( branch_node(i) )*yss**2
00404         zzquad( parent_node(i) ) = zzquad( parent_node(i) ) +  zzquad( branch_node(i) ) - 2*zdip( branch_node(i) )*zss &
00405              + charge( branch_node(i) )*zss**2 
00406         xyquad( parent_node(i) ) = xyquad( parent_node(i) ) +  xyquad( branch_node(i) ) - xdip( branch_node(i) )*yss &
00407              - ydip( branch_node(i) )*xss + charge( branch_node(i) )*xss*yss
00408         yzquad( parent_node(i) ) = yzquad( parent_node(i) ) +  yzquad( branch_node(i) ) - ydip( branch_node(i) )*zss &
00409              - zdip( branch_node(i) )*yss + charge( branch_node(i) )*yss*zss
00410         zxquad( parent_node(i) ) = zxquad( parent_node(i) ) +  zxquad( branch_node(i) ) - zdip( branch_node(i) )*xss &
00411              - xdip( branch_node(i) )*zss + charge( branch_node(i) )*zss*xss
00412 
00413         magmx( parent_node(i) ) = magmx( parent_node(i) ) + magmx( branch_node(i) ) - 0.5*yss*jz( branch_node(i) )  - 0.5*zss*jy( branch_node(i) ) 
00414         magmy( parent_node(i) ) = magmy( parent_node(i) ) + magmy( branch_node(i) ) - 0.5*zss*jx( branch_node(i) )  - 0.5*xss*jz( branch_node(i) ) 
00415         magmz( parent_node(i) ) = magmz( parent_node(i) ) + magmz( branch_node(i) ) - 0.5*xss*jy( branch_node(i) )  - 0.5*yss*jx( branch_node(i) ) 
00416 
00417         jx( parent_node(i) ) = jx( parent_node(i) ) + jx( branch_node(i) )
00418         jy( parent_node(i) ) = jy( parent_node(i) ) + jy( branch_node(i) )
00419         jz( parent_node(i) ) = jz( parent_node(i) ) + jz( branch_node(i) )
00420      end do
00421 
00422 
00423      nparent = nuniq
00424   end do
00425 
00426   ! Rezero dipole and quadrupole sums of all local leaf nodes
00427   do i=1,nleaf_pw
00428      xdip(i) = 0.
00429      ydip(i) = 0.
00430      zdip(i) = 0.
00431      xxquad(i) = 0.
00432      yyquad(i) = 0.
00433      zzquad(i) = 0.
00434      xyquad(i) = 0.
00435      yzquad(i) = 0.
00436      zxquad(i) = 0.
00437      magmx(i) = 0.
00438      magmy(i) = 0.
00439      magmz(i) = 0.
00440   end do
00441 
00442   call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Synchronize
00443 
00444 end subroutine tree_properties
Generated on Tue Jan 23 16:02:50 2007 for PEPC by  1.4.7-20060810
